massage?"},{"lineNumber":131212,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すみません、シィルさん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Excuse me, Seel."},{"lineNumber":131213,"originalJapaneseLine":"　宜しくお願いします」","translatedEnglishLine":"Please take care of it.\""},{"lineNumber":131214,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes."},{"lineNumber":131215,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ささ、ランス様、行きましょう","translatedEnglishLine":"Well then, Lord Rance, let's go."},{"lineNumber":131216,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むーむー……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mmm, mmm...\""},{"lineNumber":131217,"originalJapaneseLine":"と、ランスがシィルに手を引かれ","translatedEnglishLine":"And as Rance was led by the hand by Seel,"},{"lineNumber":131218,"originalJapaneseLine":"ソファに戻ろうとすると――","translatedEnglishLine":"he tried to return to the sofa—"},{"lineNumber":131219,"originalJapaneseLine":"「失礼します！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Excuse me!"},{"lineNumber":131220,"originalJapaneseLine":"　き、緊急の報告が！","translatedEnglishLine":"An emergency report!"},{"lineNumber":131221,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――どうしました？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"—What is it?"},{"lineNumber":131222,"originalJapaneseLine":"「敵襲です！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's an enemy attack!"},{"lineNumber":131223,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔物一個軍がこちら、","translatedEnglishLine":"A single army of monsters is,"},{"lineNumber":131224,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス城に真っ直ぐ接近中！」","translatedEnglishLine":"approaching straight toward Rance Castle!"},{"lineNumber":131225,"originalJapaneseLine":"「規模は？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What is the scale?"},{"lineNumber":131226,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ざっと見て、3000！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Roughly 3,000!"},{"lineNumber":131227,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物将軍が指揮しています！」","translatedEnglishLine":"A monster general is leading them!"},{"lineNumber":131228,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、3000だって……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-3,000, you say...?"},{"lineNumber":131229,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この城の兵の数などたかが知れてる……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The number of soldiers in this castle is just a mere handful..."},{"lineNumber":131230,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それでは到底太刀打ちが……","translatedEnglishLine":"We won't stand a chance against that..."},{"lineNumber":131231,"originalJapaneseLine":"「参りましたね……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We're in trouble here..."},{"lineNumber":131232,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人が少なく拠点として価値の低いここは","translatedEnglishLine":"This place has few people and little value as a base,"},{"lineNumber":131233,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物も通り過ぎるような場所である筈なのに……","translatedEnglishLine":"and monsters would normally just pass right through..."},{"lineNumber":131234,"originalJapaneseLine":"「イレギュラー行動を取る部隊もあった、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It seems there was a unit taking irregular action,"},{"lineNumber":131235,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ということですな……","translatedEnglishLine":"that’s what this means...\""},{"lineNumber":131236,"originalJapaneseLine":"「サーナキアさん、城を守る部隊員の数は？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sarnakia, how many troops are defending the castle?"},{"lineNumber":131237,"originalJapaneseLine":"「150名。","translatedEnglishLine":"150 personnel."},{"lineNumber":131238,"originalJapaneseLine":"　行けと言われれば無論、","translatedEnglishLine":"Of course, if ordered to go,"},{"lineNumber":131239,"originalJapaneseLine":"　騎士としては出ますが……","translatedEnglishLine":"I will go as a knight..."},{"lineNumber":131240,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とても防ぎきれませんね……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We simply cannot hold them off..."},{"lineNumber":131241,"originalJapaneseLine":"　各国から軍を呼び寄せても、","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if we call armies from various countries,"},{"lineNumber":131242,"originalJapaneseLine":"　間に合わないでしょうし……","translatedEnglishLine":"they would not arrive in time..."},{"lineNumber":131243,"originalJapaneseLine":"「仕方ありませんな……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It can't be helped..."},{"lineNumber":131244,"originalJapaneseLine":"　癪ではありますが、城を放棄し、撤退を――","translatedEnglishLine":"Though it's frustrating, we should abandon the castle and retreat—"},{"lineNumber":131245,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すとーーーーーっぷ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Stooooop!\""},{"lineNumber":131246,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ランスさん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Rance-san?"},{"lineNumber":131247,"originalJapaneseLine":"「総統、なんのおつもりですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Supreme Commander, what are your intentions?"},{"lineNumber":131248,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がーっはっはっはっはっはっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahaha!\""},{"lineNumber":131249,"originalJapaneseLine":"「丁度いいではないか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This is perfect."},{"lineNumber":131250,"originalJapaneseLine":"　暇していたところだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I was just bored."},{"lineNumber":131251,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺が出る」","translatedEnglishLine":"I will go."},{"lineNumber":131252,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なっ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wha-..."},{"lineNumber":131253,"originalJapaneseLine":"　総統閣下！　貴方は暇潰しで","translatedEnglishLine":"Supreme Commander! Are you planning to waste time and"},{"lineNumber":131254,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本部を危険に晒すおつもりですか！？","translatedEnglishLine":"endanger the headquarters!?"},{"lineNumber":131255,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……何か、お考えのことが","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Surely you have something in mind,"},{"lineNumber":131256,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あってのことですよね？　総統閣下」","translatedEnglishLine":"right, Supreme Commander?\""},{"lineNumber":131257,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふむふむ、敵の数は3000と。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, so the enemy numbers 3,000."},{"lineNumber":131258,"originalJapaneseLine":"　面倒だし、頭だけ叩くか」","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s troublesome, so I'll just strike the head of the snake."},{"lineNumber":131259,"originalJapaneseLine":"「バレス、ウルザちゃん、クリームちゃん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Bares, Ulza-chan, Cream-chan."},{"lineNumber":131260,"originalJapaneseLine":"　各国代表の優秀な戦士を数人ずつ貸せ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lend me a few excellent warriors from each nation's delegation.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 退屈なら、私が肩もみでもしましょうか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you're bored, shall I give you a shoulder massage?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すみません、シィルさん。
宜しくお願いします」
「はい。
ささ、ランス様、行きましょう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, Lord Rance, let's go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むーむー……」
と、ランスがシィルに手を引かれ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And as Rance was led by the hand by Seel,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ソファに戻ろうとすると――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he tried to return to the sofa—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「失礼します！
き、緊急の報告が！
「――どうしました？」
「敵襲です！」
「魔物一個軍がこちら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A single army of monsters is,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城に真っ直ぐ接近中！」
「規模は？」
「ざっと見て、3000！
魔物将軍が指揮しています！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A monster general is leading them!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この城の兵の数などたかが知れてる……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The number of soldiers in this castle is just a mere handful...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでは到底太刀打ちが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We won't stand a chance against that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「参りましたね……
人が少なく拠点として価値の低いここは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This place has few people and little value as a base,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物も通り過ぎるような場所である筈なのに……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and monsters would normally just pass right through...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「イレギュラー行動を取る部隊もあった、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It seems there was a unit taking irregular action,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ということですな……
「サーナキアさん、城を守る部隊員の数は？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sarnakia, how many troops are defending the castle?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行けと言われれば無論、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course, if ordered to go,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 騎士としては出ますが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will go as a knight...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とても防ぎきれませんね……
各国から軍を呼び寄せても、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if we call armies from various countries,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 間に合わないでしょうし……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they would not arrive in time...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「仕方ありませんな……
癪ではありますが、城を放棄し、撤退を――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though it's frustrating, we should abandon the castle and retreat—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すとーーーーーっぷ！」
「……ランスさん？」
「総統、なんのおつもりですか？」
「がーっはっはっはっはっはっ！」
「丁度いいではないか。
暇していたところだ」
「俺が出る」
「なっ……
総統閣下！　貴方は暇潰しで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Supreme Commander! Are you planning to waste time and

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本部を危険に晒すおつもりですか！？
「……何か、お考えのことが
あってのことですよね？　総統閣下」
「ふむふむ、敵の数は3000と。
面倒だし、頭だけ叩くか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s troublesome, so I'll just strike the head of the snake.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「バレス、ウルザちゃん、クリームちゃん。
各国代表の優秀な戦士を数人ずつ貸せ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lend me a few excellent warriors from each nation's delegation."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 退屈なら、私が肩もみでもしましょうか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you're bored, shall I give you a shoulder massage?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すみません、シィルさん。
宜しくお願いします」
「はい。
ささ、ランス様、行きましょう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, Lord Rance, let's go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むーむー……」
と、ランスがシィルに手を引かれ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And as Rance was led by the hand by Seel,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ソファに戻ろうとすると――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he tried to return to the sofa—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「失礼します！
き、緊急の報告が！
「――どうしました？」
「敵襲です！」
「魔物一個軍がこちら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A single army of monsters is,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城に真っ直ぐ接近中！」
「規模は？」
「ざっと見て、3000！
魔物将軍が指揮しています！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A monster general is leading them!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この城の兵の数などたかが知れてる……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The number of soldiers in this castle is just a mere handful...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでは到底太刀打ちが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We won't stand a chance against that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「参りましたね……
人が少なく拠点として価値の低いここは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This place has few people and little value as a base,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物も通り過ぎるような場所である筈なのに……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and monsters would normally just pass right through...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「イレギュラー行動を取る部隊もあった、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It seems there was a unit taking irregular action,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ということですな……
「サーナキアさん、城を守る部隊員の数は？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sarnakia, how many troops are defending the castle?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行けと言われれば無論、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course, if ordered to go,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 騎士としては出ますが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will go as a knight...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とても防ぎきれませんね……
各国から軍を呼び寄せても、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if we call armies from various countries,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 間に合わないでしょうし……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they would not arrive in time...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「仕方ありませんな……
癪ではありますが、城を放棄し、撤退を――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though it's frustrating, we should abandon the castle and retreat—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すとーーーーーっぷ！」
「……ランスさん？」
「総統、なんのおつもりですか？」
「がーっはっはっはっはっはっ！」
「丁度いいではないか。
暇していたところだ」
「俺が出る」
「なっ……
総統閣下！　貴方は暇潰しで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Supreme Commander! Are you planning to waste time and

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本部を危険に晒すおつもりですか！？
「……何か、お考えのことが
あってのことですよね？　総統閣下」
「ふむふむ、敵の数は3000と。
面倒だし、頭だけ叩くか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s troublesome, so I'll just strike the head of the snake.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「バレス、ウルザちゃん、クリームちゃん。
各国代表の優秀な戦士を数人ずつ貸せ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lend me a few excellent warriors from each nation's delegation."
